item.title: My new site
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

fellixombc:

tables, html? heck no…i use css. but in the center i used css cuz i er lazy

You completely misunderstand the concept of css. This is something you should go for, not a design with a huge background image.

Read full topic

item.title: My new site
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

More like you just use 1 image for everything.

I’m just saying that the black space on the left you have is very unappealing, and that you should try expanding your “tables” and centering them.

Read full topic

item.title: My new site
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:11, topic:126843”][quote author=welshy link=topic=177448.msg1626730#msg1626730 date=1185345605]
if your background is black the dont use an image lmao … just use background-color: #000000;
[/quote]

Actually, pretty much all of it is the background, its one big image.

Navigation is spelled wrong fyi.

Maybe try to center the tables and expand them, that big black area is really boring.[/quote]
tables, html? heck no…i use css. but in the center i used css cuz i er lazy

Read full topic

item.title: My new site
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:7, topic:126843”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=177448.msg1626529#msg1626529 date=1185337839]
Umm, what the fuck? I have never seen a site like that before.

Why do you have the background as the layout and everything? You could have used about 10 kb worth of images to make that site, and instead you chose to set a 180kb background image, with non-expanding content-holders. If I were rating this, I’d have to give it a 0/10 for usability, 0/10 for design, and 10/10 for humor.
[/quote]

um thanks lol?[/quote]
he made be flaming asshole…but hes right

ur supposed to split the layout in photoshop…

Read full topic
